body_html:
4 import dlib
----> 5 import torch
      6 import torch.nn as nn
      7 from enum import Enum

~/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py in <module>()
     78     pass
     79 
---> 80 from torch._C import *
     81 
     82 __all__ += [name for name in dir(_C)

ValueError: module functions cannot set METH_CLASS or METH_STATIC

As can be observed, I have the same error, although I've ran:

pip install numpy -I

numpy seems to be at 1.15.1 now. I'm also running python 3.6.5.

The fix that led to the closing of this issue does not seem to fix this problem as of this moment, can we reopen this issue?

body:
```
      4 import dlib
----> 5 import torch
      6 import torch.nn as nn
      7 from enum import Enum

~/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py in <module>()
     78     pass
     79 
---> 80 from torch._C import *
     81 
     82 __all__ += [name for name in dir(_C)

ValueError: module functions cannot set METH_CLASS or METH_STATIC
```

As can be observed, I have the same error, although I've ran:

`pip install numpy -I`

numpy seems to be at 1.15.1 now. I'm also running python 3.6.5.

The fix that led to the closing of this issue does not seem to fix this problem as of this moment, can we reopen this issue?
